review.summary: Clean dependency module __init__.py file that properly exports all action-related dependency injection functions. File serves as the public API for the actions dependency module with clear organization and comprehensive __all__ list.

positive_observations.observation: Uses comprehensive __all__ list with explicit public API control following neo-commons patterns
Clean imports with all dependencies coming from single action_dependencies module
Well-organized exports grouped by logical categories (Repository, Command, Query, Service, Schema Dependencies)
Consistent naming conventions with get_ prefix for all dependency functions
Proper module documentation describing the file's purpose
Minimal and focused - exactly what an __init__.py file should be

context.tests: No tests needed for simple export module
